name: Janitor's Termination
description:
This game was made for the 1st Collab Jam Theme: THE UNEXPECTED. All assets and game code were made within 48hours. 

I didn't have time to put audio or the voice lines I had planned into the game.

Thank you everyone who participated in the jam! If you think I should host another one in the future let me know! I had a blast talking with the community as we all made games together! :D

My socials: YouTube Channel, Discord, Instagram

Read the story before you play!

You've been working at this school for 10 years now.

You love it!

You would never trade this janitorial position for the world.

Today your boss approaches you with a concerning face!

"We Love having you here James, But I'm firing you, like right now. Please Leave" he says.

You're shocked! You weren't expecting to get fired "I thought they loved having me here!" you thought to yourself.

"Oh! and could you clean the floors one last time before you leave, thank you!" said boss man as he leaves.

"Oh, I'll make sure the floors get real clean" you thought to yourself with a grin on your face.

You grab your broom and you get to work!
